title: New Mordekaiser exiting his ult after he killed someone in there

replies.body: It's going to be {{champion:80}} levels of "oh wait...... My team is dead..... FFFFFUUUUUUUU!!"
"oh ya...your much more of a mordekaiser"
I don't know why I imagined old Mordes metal all over the place and this colossus walking out and Doctor Strange sitting there saying that. I can't stop laughing.
